simplifiedChinese.title: Concerning Unity
simplifiedChinese.Question1: List all the questions raised in the text. Who makes them? To whom are they made?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Is there a question that stands out to you? Why?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What questions would you like to be able to ask the author of this text?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What implications do these questions from the text have for your life?
